content:
Prev: Kiley takes a dad break Up: Mariners vs Cubs Next: Timothy

Timothy and Zion



Despite being half a head taller, Zion is slightly younger -- Timothy was really excited about Zion's birthday party the following Saturday, for which he had to miss the next game.
Taken Thursday, April 22, 2004, 05:16:15pm.  Original image size: 1728x3072, 6.3Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/1000s @ F4.0, ISO 200, 70-200mm/F2.8+1.4x @ 220mm (352mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 5200:-5, 1.25:8:50:75:0:25:35+M, Copy, Ditto w/exp=0, Paste, Channel as mask, Reveal selection, Curves 0:0 - 190:210 - 205:225 - 255:255, Crop, USM 20:5
